author: Staff reports
title: 5 things to know: Part of 285 is shutting down entirely this...
text:
Five things to know for Friday, Oct. 16:
1. A section of I-285 will be closed entirely over the weekend. A ll northbound and southbound lanes will close between Paces Ferry Road and Atlanta Road. [ Read here for complete coverage on weekend road closures ]
2. Atlanta radio host Steve McCoy was let go after it was revealed he lied about a Donald Trump interview this week. He has also revealed that he has been struggling with Parkinson's disease. [ More on the interview | More on his disclosure of Parkinson's ]
3. The NOAA has reported that Georgia will experience a colder than normal winter and will have more precipitation. [ Will there be another ice storm? ]
4. Tensions on the Buford City Commission spilled over at a Doobie Brothers concert when two families got into a fight. The four involved in the fight were a commissioner, his son and the two sons of the another commissioner. [ Read more here ]
5. Tonight's temperatures will dip into the 40s. [ Will it rain? ]
